title: Chicken Soup for the Bride's Soul: Stories of Love, Laughter and Commitment to Last a Lifetime
description: Encompassing everything from first proposal to anniversary memories, this inspirational celebration of marriage offers a selection of touching, poignant, humorous, and joyous essays, stories, and reflections for the bride and bride-to-be. Simultaneous. 400,000 first printing.
author: Jack Canfield
